lines.text: Look, I'm sorry if I made you angry, Linda.
It's not you, Ferdy. I'm just not used to be chased around a mall in the middle of the night by killer robots.
You know, I got a worry.
Report from the front, Ferdy's got a worry.
Yeah?
What if these things can read our minds?
It'll be awful mad when it gets to me!
Smoking's bad for your health.
I have to have a cigarette, and I have to have one now!

[rubs her leg]
Are you for real? Can't you think of anything you'd rather have.

[shoves him away]
No!
You always get your way don't you?
When I'm happy, everybody's happy.
That's for sure... hand me my badge, would ya?
What's the magic word?
Hand me my badge... please
[she hands him the badge]
Thank you.
Oh, Mike...
What?

[flashes him]
Hurry back.
Count on it.
Why Do I have the feeling I'm going to regret this in the morning!
Waitress, more butter!
Hey - would I set you up with a slime dog or something? No way, babe.

[together]
It is babe, isn't it?

[to passing guy]
Hey, babe.
It is babe, isn't it?
Nice shot!
Dad's a marine.
Oh! Fuck the fuchsia it's Friday!
Computer, huh? Let's go trash the fucker.
Let's send these fuckers a Rambo-gram.
I'm sorry. It's not you, Ferdy. I guess I'm just not used to running around a shopping mall in the middle of the night being chased by killer robots.
You smell like pepperoni.
Well, if that's how you feel...
Wait a minute...
What?
I LIKE pepperoni.
You sure you know how to handle that thing?
Sure I can. I saw Dirty Harry 24 times.
Hey... How much do I owe you for the beer?
Forget it. If we get out of here, you can get me a six-pack.
Greg, man, you're not thinking. We made it this far by sticking together.
Yeah, and that really helped Suzie, right...?
He's not gonna know unless you tell him. And you're not gonna tell him, ARE you?
You know Brennan, you're becoming a real candidate for prickhood.
Hey... Have a nice day!
[repeated line after the robots kill someone]
Thank you... have a nice day.
Jesus!
What's that?
Robot blood!
